text: Simone Thérèse Fernande Simon (23 April 1910 or 1911 – 22 February 2005) was a French actress. She was known for her roles in Ladies in Love, Danger – Love at Work, 7th Heaven and La Ronde. ==References== Category:1911 births Category:2005 deaths Category:French movie actors Category:French television actors Category:French stage actors
title: Simone Simon
